function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Positive association between natural environment and COVID-19 mortality in Brazil","Impact":"Misunderstanding the impact of natural environment on COVID-19 mortality","Mitigation":"Conduct further research to understand the underlying factors of the positive association","Technologies":"Data analysis tools, statistical modeling","People":"Researchers, public health officials","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Greater mortality rates in nonmetropolitan counties compared to metropolitan counties","Impact":"Increased risk of COVID-19 mortality in nonmetropolitan areas","Mitigation":"Implement targeted public health interventions and education in nonmetropolitan areas","Technologies":"Telemedicine, community outreach programs","People":"Residents of nonmetropolitan counties, public health officials","Owner":"Public health organizations, local governments"},{"Description":"Positive associations between percent of black population, older population, and COVID-19 mortality","Impact":"Higher COVID-19 mortality rates in communities with greater percentage of black and older populations","Mitigation":"Address systemic healthcare disparities, provide targeted resources and support for at-risk communities","Technologies":"Healthcare access programs, community health initiatives","People":"Black and older populations, public health officials","Owner":"Healthcare institutions, public health organizations"}]}
